core.transformation

Class AbstractTransformation<S,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.transformation.AbstractTransformation<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of the source element to transform.
    T - The type of the target element to obtain.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ITransformation<S,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractAdaptation, AbstractConversion

    public abstract class AbstractTransformation<S,T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITransformation<S,T>
    an AbstractTransformation abstract class that is used to factor the common interface and state of all concrete atomic metamodeling transformation classes.

    It must be specialized by all concrete metamodeling transformation classes.
    Author:
    Bachar Rima
    See Also:
    ITransformation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AbstractTransformation()
      Creates an empty transformation
      AbstractTransformation(S source)
      Creates an transformation from a source element and applies the transformation afterwards to directly get the target.
